full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO LA BRTEN NAS BZLOG PA'I CHO GA RDO RJE PHA LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO LA BRTEN NAS BZLOG PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL RDO RJE PHA LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, CANG LJUN CHOS GRVA GA-YAS PA'I GRVA RIGS, SKU SKYE DPAL LDAN NYI 'OD KYIS BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG GI GZUGS BSNYAN 'CHANG BA GSER TOG MKHAN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS, SKU 'BUM GSER THOG BLA BRANG BDE CHEN BSAM GTAN GLING GI GZIMS CHUNG BKRA SHIS GA-YANG 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,) BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,
